content.question: Which of the following best describes an example of a harmful effect of an invasive species on biodiversity?

choices.label: Invasive zebra mussels increase the population size of several native mollusks in a lake ecosystem.
Asian carp outcompete native fish species in rivers in the United States.
Polar bears prey on ringed and bearded seals in an Arctic ecosystem.
Wind-blown seeds from a grass species colonize a new volcanic island in the Pacific Ocean.

content.answer: Asian carp outcompete native fish species in rivers in the United States.

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Describe disadvantages, advantages, or unintended consequences for potential solutions.
